forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. East wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Patchy Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and midnight, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers between midnight and 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 63. East wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
A subtle heaviness hangs over Boston this afternoon, the atmosphere pregnant with the promise of showers and the occasional rumble of thunder. Clouds lazily drape the city like a well-worn blanket, a moody canvas tinged gray and inviting but also hinting at the possibility of relief from the heat. The temperature dips gently toward the mid-seventies, a whisper of coolness brushing against your skin with the easterly breeze. Yet, as evening approaches, anticipate the sky to cloak the horizon in a veil of mist, ushering in patches of fog amid the marvel of yet another summer evening. 

For those venturing outdoors, this is a day to embrace layered comforts; a light sweater or cardigan would serve as a charming companion to fend off the creeping coolness after the sun sinks below the horizon. With a well-stocked umbrella at hand, seize the opportunity to take a leisurely stroll along the esplanade or wander through the lively streets, the allure of a quaint café beckoning with the steam of hot coffee and perhaps a well-deserved slice of cake. Alternatively, the call of a quiet evening at home with a good book or some classic films could be equally satisfying, wrapped in the cozy embrace of your favorite blanket as the city prepares for a night that feels both intimate and refreshingly mysterious.
